subject: [ANN]Junit 3.7 port to J#

Jeff Miller and I ported Junit 3.7 port to J#. I would like to see if 
there is any interest in it.
You can find the first build at http://vydra.net/jsharp-unit

The syntax is for the runner is <full-class-name,dll-name>
 ex: com.me.test.AllTests,mytests.dll

Regards,
David

btw, all changes are 100% java so you can use your favorite java IDE.
Also, it is so nice to port a product that comes with its own suite 
of tests :)
